description: Field must exactly equal the provided value.
Field must differ from the provided value.
Field should fuzzy-match the value (partial / pattern).
Field must be contained in a small set of values.
Field must not be contained in a given set of values.
Field must contain the substring or keyword.
Field must start with the provided prefix.
Field must end with the provided suffix.
Field must be greater than the provided value (lexicographic / numeric / date).
Field must be less than the provided value (lexicographic / numeric / date).
